newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Complete Business Q2 shr $0.19.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Complete Business Q2 shr $0.19.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: The company's 1996 earnings figure's are pro forma, reflecting the impact of the March 5, 1997 initial public offering and resulting changes in taxable status of the company.
The six months earnings figures are pro forma as well.
The company reported a pro forma provision for income tax for 1996 of $385,000. It reported a net income for 1996, non proforma, of $1.0 million.
The company reported income from operations of $2.4 million compared to $1.3 million.
The company said its results reflect a growth in its professional work force, increases in average billing rates, as well as new clients and continued repeat business from existing clients.
The company's full name is Complete Business Solutions Inc.
